", "address": null, "days": null, "platform": null, "format": false, "is_active": true, "cancellation_policy": null, "external_link": null, "view_count": 41, "created_at": "2024-12-25T00:09:05.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-02-25T11:16:12.000000Z" }, { "id": 61, "category_id": 39, "sub_category_id": null, "city_id": 14, "currency_id": 5, "company_id": null, "ad_fee_id": null, "name": "NVICinema : The Children Behind Zalaga", "upload_by": "myevnt", "organized_by": "NVIC - Netherlands-Flemish Institute in Cairo", "location": "1, Dr. Mahmoud Azmi Street, Zamalek, Egypt, 11211", "description": "

The Children Behind Zalaga

\r\n\r\n

A Documentary by Karim Ali | 2023 | 65 min | Egypt | In Arabic with English subtitles

\r\n\r\n

Every year in South Sinai, young jockeys are chosen to compete in the Zalaga race—the oldest camel race in Egypt. This gripping documentary offers an intimate look at the child camel racers of South Sinai, highlighting the centuries-old Bedouin tradition that fuels their dreams of success. From wealthy investors to skilled trainers, and young jockeys who sacrifice their education for financial support, witness the highs and lows of the camel racing industry through their eyes.

\r\n\r\n

Karim Ali is a documentary filmmaker who studied Media Management at the Arab Academy for Science, Technology, and Maritime Transport in Alexandria, Egypt. His debut short film, Airplane Mode (2017), was set in Dahab, South Sinai. His second documentary, The Children Behind Zalaga (2023), has been selected for the IDFA Festival 2023 and Vision du Réel 2024.

\r\n\r\n

Meet people, make friends and speak a lot of language with BlaBla Cairo
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------
\r\n HOW OUR EVENTS WORK 
\r\n It's very easy.
\r\nWe always start our events in  English and / or the local language. Then, once two or three people want to speak the same language, it will be possible to create a new linguistic group. For example if 2 or 3 people wish to speak French, we will create a group in  French .
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 Yes, you can arrive late! Maximum 45min after the start of the event. However, being on time is greatly appreciated.
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 Our events are free; however, each participant shares in the space's rent.
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 /  By participating in our events, you agree to be photographed and / or filmed. The photos and videos will be shared on our social networks and may be used for commercial purposes. You can also post your own photos with the #BlaBlaSelfie and #BlaBlaLanguageExchange HTag
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 This event does not welcome children, even accompanied by parents

Welcome to Earth Astrology ORACLE: Insights on the Astrological Year ahead!

\r\n\r\n

Join us for an exciting virtual tour of the key themes of the astrological year ahead -- March 21 2025 to March 21 2026 -- the most dramatic and historic year of our lifetimes!

\r\n\r\n

Astrologer David Nicol will share insights on the historic nature of the passage just ahead, offer practices and guidance for energetic alignment, and lead a live experiential transmission. Don't miss this opportunity to connect with astrology lovers worldwide and prepare yourself for the huge changes to come.

", "address": null, "days": null, "platform": null, "format": false, "is_active": true, "cancellation_policy": null, "external_link": null, "view_count": 3, "created_at": "2025-02-24T12:52:58.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-02-24T19:58:03.000000Z" }, { "id": 106, "category_id": 22, "sub_category_id": 56, "city_id": 5, "currency_id": 5, "company_id": null, "ad_fee_id": null, "name": "IAAUG 3rd annual conference", "upload_by": "My Evnt", "organized_by": "IAAUG Conference 2025", "location": "Triumph Luxury Hotel, Block 19 in front of Katameya Heights, Fifth Settlement,Cairo, Egypt", "description": "

Join us for the 3rd Annual Conference on Aesthetic Gynecology, organized by IAAUG, where we bring together leading experts and practitioners from around the world. This prestigious event will feature evidence-based discussions on some of the most debated and controversial topics within obstetrics and gynecology, with a special focus on aesthetic gynecology.
\r\n
\r\nWe warmly welcome doctors and specialists from across the globe to engage in cutting-edge scientific sessions, share knowledge, and connect with renowned international speakers.
\r\n
\r\nDon't miss this opportunity to be part of a transformative experience in the field of aesthetic gynecology! We look forward to seeing you there.

\r\n\r\n

 Celebrate 2025 with 212 Ladies Gym! 
\r\nJoin us for an unforgettable evening of fun, fitness, and celebration on 𝐖𝐞𝐝𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐝𝐚𝐲, 𝐃𝐞𝐜𝐞𝐦𝐛𝐞𝐫 𝟐𝟓𝐭𝐡.
\r\nWe’ve lined up an incredible schedule just for you:
\r\n 𝟕:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: Kick off the night with Ahad’s captivating Belly Dance Class.
\r\n 𝟖:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: Get moving with Dudu’s high-energy Zumba Class.
\r\n 𝟗:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: End the evening on a spectacular note with a mesmerizing performance by the amazing dancer Anna.
\r\nIt’s the perfect way to celebrate the season, stay active, and enjoy the community.
\r\nDon’t miss out—let’s welcome 2025 together in style!
\r\n 212 Ladies Gym – Where Fitness Meets Fun!

Dear Family's and friends

\r\n\r\n

HAPPY NEW YEAR 2025

\r\n\r\n

We are pleased to announce the grand opening of our new guest house, the Pyramids Temple Guest House. We have put in a lot of effort and thought into creating a place that offers comfort, convenience, and a touch of Egyptian charm.

\r\n\r\n

We would be honored if you could join us for the opening party on 31 Dec 2024, from 9 pm to 1 Am.
\r\nWe promise an evening of good company, delicious Egyptian sweets, and refreshing beverages, including water and soft drinks. You are also welcome to bring along any drink with you.

\r\n\r\n

Feel free to extend this invitation to your family and friends. The more, the merrier!

\r\n\r\n

We look forward to welcoming you to our guest house and sharing a memorable evening of New Year 2025

\r\n\r\n

Best Regards
\r\nPyramids Temple Guest House

Meet people, make friends and speak a lot of language with BlaBla Cairo
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------
\r\n HOW OUR EVENTS WORK 
\r\n It's very easy.
\r\nWe always start our events in  English and / or the local language. Then, once two or three people want to speak the same language, it will be possible to create a new linguistic group. For example if 2 or 3 people wish to speak French, we will create a group in  French .
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 Yes, you can arrive late! Maximum 45min after the start of the event. However, being on time is greatly appreciated.
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 Our events are free; however, each participant shares in the space's rent.
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 /  By participating in our events, you agree to be photographed and / or filmed. The photos and videos will be shared on our social networks and may be used for commercial purposes. You can also post your own photos with the #BlaBlaSelfie and #BlaBlaLanguageExchange HTag
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 This event does not welcome children, even accompanied by parents

", "start_date": null, "end_date": null, "poster": [ { "id": 218, "name": "poster", "description": "457858427_1021227140010874_2651849212192910415_n.jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2024_12_24/gwPr7ASbwOuVXmBrghVut86nZQzSOmMzFJEYjhA2.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 222651, "created_at": "2024-12-24T22:23:26.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-24T22:23:26.000000Z" } ], "banner": [ { "id": 219, "name": "banner", "description": "457858427_1021227140010874_2651849212192910415_n.jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2024_12_24/7iB0JDPIgXEiwbgA1R1vmZ8gFHnrzXIxCP6cHiS0.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 222651, "created_at": "2024-12-24T22:23:26.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-24T22:23:26.000000Z" } ], "company": null, "category": { "id": 22, "parent_id": null, "name": "Education", "is_parent": 1, "icon": "fas fa-graduation-cap fa-2x", "description": null, "created_at": "2024-09-30T21:45:59.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-09-30T21:45:59.000000Z" }, "city": { "id": 14, "country_id": 1, "is_available": true, "name": "Cairo", "created_at": "2024-10-10T01:39:04.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-10T01:39:04.000000Z" }, "currency": { "id": 5, "name": "Egyptain pound", "code": "EG", "status": true, "created_at": "2024-09-30T17:44:25.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-01T17:33:41.000000Z" }, "tickets": [ { "id": 77, "ticket_type": "Normal Price", "price": "0.00", "quantity": 50, "status": null, "created_at": "2024-12-24T22:23:26.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-24T22:23:26.000000Z" } ], "format": false, "address": null, "is_active": true, "cancellation_policy": null, "location": "16 Adly street, 3rd floor, wust elbalad, cairo", "created_at": "2024-12-24T22:23:26.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-06T00:40:30.000000Z" }, { "id": 57, "name": "دورات الابداع , تحويل الأفكار المميزة الى حملات ابداعية مؤثرة تبقى في الذاكرة لسنوات.", "description": "

هذا الشهر، يسعدنا أن يكون "وصفي" هو المتحدث الضيف في Creative Mornings!
\r\nمن مدير حسابات إقليمي حائز على جوائز ذهبية إلى مؤسس ومدير عام وكالة Bubblegum Advertising، رحلة وصفي هي شهادة حقيقية على الشغف، والمخاطرة، والكثير من الإبداع. ✨
\r\nبخبرة تتجاوز 26 عامًا في كلاً من مصر والولايات المتحدة، يُعتبر وصفي قوة مؤثرة في عالم الإعلانات (وبالمناسبة، هو بطل قومي في الغطس أيضًا! 🏆).
\r\n
\r\nانضموا إلينا هذا الشهر لإكتشاف قصته، بينما نستكشف دورات الإبداع وما يلزم لصناعة حملات إعلانية ملهمة يتذكرها الناس لسنوات. 🗓️
\r\nفي انتظاركم السبت 28 ديسمبر، الساعة 11 صباحًا في قنصلية، 5 شارع الفضل، باب اللوق، عابدين.
\r\nالحضور مجانًا،

ينظم بيت السناري التابع لقطاع التواصل الثقافي بمكتبة الإسكندرية حفلًا فنيًا مفتوحًا للجمهور بعنوان "ميكروفون 17"، يوم الخميس 9 يناير 2025 في تمام الــ 7 مساءً، بمقر بيت السناري الأثري في السيدة زينب، القاهرة.

\r\n\r\n

يشارك في الحفل مجموعة من المواهب الشابة التي ستقدم مجموعة مختارة من الأغاني والقصائد والأشعار التي ستلامس قلوب الحاضرين بجمال الكلمات وعذوبة الألحان، منهم:

\r\n\r\n

- مصطفى أسامة
\r\n- أحمد مدحت
\r\n- شريهان عرفة
\r\n- فوكس
\r\n- مايكل رضا

\r\n\r\n

يهدف هذا الحفل إلى نشر الوعي الثقافي وتشجيع المواهب الشابة، وتسليط الضوء على أهمية الفن والموسيقى في حياة الأفراد والمجتمع. كما يسعى إلى خلق حالة ثقافية إبداعية بين الشباب وتعزيز التواصل مع الشخصيات الثقافية والفنية والإعلامية المعروفة.

\r\n\r\n

يُذكر أن فريق "ميكروفون" تأسس منذ عام 2010، وهو تجمع فني وأدبي وثقافي للشباب الموهوبين، يعمل على اكتشاف المواهب وتقديم الفنون المختلفة.

دعوة لمحبين الأعمال اليدوية المميزة

\r\n\r\n

ندعوكم للمشاركة في أضخم حدث للفن اليدوي والحرف الأصيلة في مصر

\r\n\r\n

تعالوا واستمتعوا مجاناً بفعاليات معرض الحرف اليدوية في سوق الفسطاط ، حيث يجتمع الحرفيون والمبدعون من جميع محافظات مصر، ليعرضوا أجمل أعمالهم الفنية ومنتجاتهم الأصيلة.

\r\n\r\n

استعدوا لتجربة فريدة مليئة بالإبداع والجودة بين منتجات متنوعة من تطريز، إكسسوارات، منتجات جلدية، خزفية، لوحات، شموع، غيرها كتير

\r\n\r\n

 التاريخ: من 23 إلى 25 يناير
\r\n المكان: سوق الفسطاط، مصر القديمة، مجمع الأديان، أقرب محطة مترو (ماري جرجس)
\r\nلوكيشين السوق: https://maps.app.goo.gl/gjMHHXCr9M8EZLhg6

\r\n\r\n

انضموا إلينا واكتشفوا سحر الفنون والحرف، حيث الثقافة والترفيه يجتمعان في أجواء استثنائية!

\r\n\r\n

متفوتوش الفرصة للتواصل مع المبدعين مباشرة واقتناء مقتنيات فريدة.

\r\n\r\n

The Invitation is Open ( Free Entry )
\r\nWe will be waiting for you at the exhibition of arts and crafts from January 23 to 25, your opportunity to enjoy the most beautiful local products 
\r\nYou're invited to attend an exhibition dedicated to handmade art and authentic crafts, which is considered the largest gathering of craftsmen and creative people in Egypt. We will present various products that combine creativity and quality to you.
\r\nLocation: Fustat Market, Old Egypt https://maps.app.goo.gl/gjMHHXCr9M8EZLhg6 

\r\n\r\n

\r\n\r\n

 Celebrate 2025 with 212 Ladies Gym! 
\r\nJoin us for an unforgettable evening of fun, fitness, and celebration on 𝐖𝐞𝐝𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐝𝐚𝐲, 𝐃𝐞𝐜𝐞𝐦𝐛𝐞𝐫 𝟐𝟓𝐭𝐡.
\r\nWe’ve lined up an incredible schedule just for you:
\r\n 𝟕:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: Kick off the night with Ahad’s captivating Belly Dance Class.
\r\n 𝟖:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: Get moving with Dudu’s high-energy Zumba Class.
\r\n 𝟗:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: End the evening on a spectacular note with a mesmerizing performance by the amazing dancer Anna.
\r\nIt’s the perfect way to celebrate the season, stay active, and enjoy the community.
\r\nDon’t miss out—let’s welcome 2025 together in style!
\r\n 212 Ladies Gym – Where Fitness Meets Fun!

{ "data": [ { "id": 51, "name": "latin night x minglings", "description": "

Latin Love proudly invites you to it's biweekly SBK night at one of the most elegant spots. 

\r\n\r\n

Get ready for an unforgettable night of dance and music! Join us this Monday, December 23rd, for a FREE Bachata Partner-Work Workshop with the Latin Love Team Hussein, Hadia & Malak, from 9 to 10 PM. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced dancer, this workshop will bring out your best Bachata vibes! 

\r\n\r\n

 Date: Monday, 23rd of December 2024.
\r\n Location: Minglings Restobar [Heliopolis]
\r\n Address: 58 Beirut, Almazah, Heliopolis.

\r\n\r\n

Free Bachata Workshop from 9:00 to 10:00 PM

Meet people, make friends and speak a lot of language with BlaBla Cairo
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------
\r\n HOW OUR EVENTS WORK 
\r\n It's very easy.
\r\nWe always start our events in  English and / or the local language. Then, once two or three people want to speak the same language, it will be possible to create a new linguistic group. For example if 2 or 3 people wish to speak French, we will create a group in  French .
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 Yes, you can arrive late! Maximum 45min after the start of the event. However, being on time is greatly appreciated.
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 Our events are free; however, each participant shares in the space's rent.
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 /  By participating in our events, you agree to be photographed and / or filmed. The photos and videos will be shared on our social networks and may be used for commercial purposes. You can also post your own photos with the #BlaBlaSelfie and #BlaBlaLanguageExchange HTag
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 This event does not welcome children, even accompanied by parents

هذا الشهر، يسعدنا أن يكون "وصفي" هو المتحدث الضيف في Creative Mornings!
\r\nمن مدير حسابات إقليمي حائز على جوائز ذهبية إلى مؤسس ومدير عام وكالة Bubblegum Advertising، رحلة وصفي هي شهادة حقيقية على الشغف، والمخاطرة، والكثير من الإبداع. ✨
\r\nبخبرة تتجاوز 26 عامًا في كلاً من مصر والولايات المتحدة، يُعتبر وصفي قوة مؤثرة في عالم الإعلانات (وبالمناسبة، هو بطل قومي في الغطس أيضًا! 🏆).
\r\n
\r\nانضموا إلينا هذا الشهر لإكتشاف قصته، بينما نستكشف دورات الإبداع وما يلزم لصناعة حملات إعلانية ملهمة يتذكرها الناس لسنوات. 🗓️
\r\nفي انتظاركم السبت 28 ديسمبر، الساعة 11 صباحًا في قنصلية، 5 شارع الفضل، باب اللوق، عابدين.
\r\nالحضور مجانًا،

", "start_date": "2024-12-28", "end_date": "2024-12-28", "poster": [ { "id": 222, "name": "poster", "description": "website banner -myevnt _dec25_W4_V1_DT1 (1).jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2024_12_26/1IPY6mdt4yuzmyG9kUY5xEkH6rRA29kaUgJr6rSh.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 724542, "created_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z" } ], "banner": [ { "id": 223, "name": "banner", "description": "website banner -myevnt _dec25_W4_V1_DT1 (1).jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2024_12_26/QEJ8tkOdt06CZMafNIINyD79DlahO8teBOIYjRGR.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 724542, "created_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z" } ], "company": null, "category": { "id": 38, "parent_id": null, "name": "workshop", "is_parent": 1, "icon": "fa-solid fa-place-of-worship fa-2xl", "description": null, "created_at": "2024-12-22T22:15:13.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-05T17:47:46.000000Z" }, "city": { "id": 14, "country_id": 1, "is_available": true, "name": "Cairo", "created_at": "2024-10-10T01:39:04.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-10T01:39:04.000000Z" }, "currency": { "id": 5, "name": "Egyptain pound", "code": "EG", "status": true, "created_at": "2024-09-30T17:44:25.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-01T17:33:41.000000Z" }, "tickets": [ { "id": 78, "ticket_type": "Normal Price", "price": "0.00", "quantity": 50, "status": null, "created_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z" } ], "format": false, "address": null, "is_active": true, "cancellation_policy": null, "location": "قنصلية، 5 شارع الفضل، باب اللوق، عابدين.", "created_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-05T17:44:18.000000Z" }, { "id": 59, "name": "حفل ميكروفون 17 للمواهب الفنية", "description": "

ينظم بيت السناري التابع لقطاع التواصل الثقافي بمكتبة الإسكندرية حفلًا فنيًا مفتوحًا للجمهور بعنوان "ميكروفون 17"، يوم الخميس 9 يناير 2025 في تمام الــ 7 مساءً، بمقر بيت السناري الأثري في السيدة زينب، القاهرة.

\r\n\r\n

يشارك في الحفل مجموعة من المواهب الشابة التي ستقدم مجموعة مختارة من الأغاني والقصائد والأشعار التي ستلامس قلوب الحاضرين بجمال الكلمات وعذوبة الألحان، منهم:

\r\n\r\n

- مصطفى أسامة
\r\n- أحمد مدحت
\r\n- شريهان عرفة
\r\n- فوكس
\r\n- مايكل رضا

\r\n\r\n

يهدف هذا الحفل إلى نشر الوعي الثقافي وتشجيع المواهب الشابة، وتسليط الضوء على أهمية الفن والموسيقى في حياة الأفراد والمجتمع. كما يسعى إلى خلق حالة ثقافية إبداعية بين الشباب وتعزيز التواصل مع الشخصيات الثقافية والفنية والإعلامية المعروفة.

\r\n\r\n

يُذكر أن فريق "ميكروفون" تأسس منذ عام 2010، وهو تجمع فني وأدبي وثقافي للشباب الموهوبين، يعمل على اكتشاف المواهب وتقديم الفنون المختلفة.

دعوة لمحبين الأعمال اليدوية المميزة

\r\n\r\n

ندعوكم للمشاركة في أضخم حدث للفن اليدوي والحرف الأصيلة في مصر

\r\n\r\n

تعالوا واستمتعوا مجاناً بفعاليات معرض الحرف اليدوية في سوق الفسطاط ، حيث يجتمع الحرفيون والمبدعون من جميع محافظات مصر، ليعرضوا أجمل أعمالهم الفنية ومنتجاتهم الأصيلة.

\r\n\r\n

استعدوا لتجربة فريدة مليئة بالإبداع والجودة بين منتجات متنوعة من تطريز، إكسسوارات، منتجات جلدية، خزفية، لوحات، شموع، غيرها كتير

\r\n\r\n

 التاريخ: من 23 إلى 25 يناير
\r\n المكان: سوق الفسطاط، مصر القديمة، مجمع الأديان، أقرب محطة مترو (ماري جرجس)
\r\nلوكيشين السوق: https://maps.app.goo.gl/gjMHHXCr9M8EZLhg6

\r\n\r\n

انضموا إلينا واكتشفوا سحر الفنون والحرف، حيث الثقافة والترفيه يجتمعان في أجواء استثنائية!

\r\n\r\n

متفوتوش الفرصة للتواصل مع المبدعين مباشرة واقتناء مقتنيات فريدة.

\r\n\r\n

The Invitation is Open ( Free Entry )
\r\nWe will be waiting for you at the exhibition of arts and crafts from January 23 to 25, your opportunity to enjoy the most beautiful local products 
\r\nYou're invited to attend an exhibition dedicated to handmade art and authentic crafts, which is considered the largest gathering of craftsmen and creative people in Egypt. We will present various products that combine creativity and quality to you.
\r\nLocation: Fustat Market, Old Egypt https://maps.app.goo.gl/gjMHHXCr9M8EZLhg6 

\r\n\r\n

See less

\r\nYou're invited to attend an exhibition dedicated to handmade art and authentic crafts, which is considered the largest gathering of craftsmen and creative people in Egypt. We will present various products that combine creativity and quality to you.
\r\nLocation: Fustat Market, Old Egypt https://maps.app.goo.gl/gjMHHXCr9M8EZLhg6 

\r\n\r\n

See less

\r\n\r\n

 Celebrate 2025 with 212 Ladies Gym! 
\r\nJoin us for an unforgettable evening of fun, fitness, and celebration on 𝐖𝐞𝐝𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐝𝐚𝐲, 𝐃𝐞𝐜𝐞𝐦𝐛𝐞𝐫 𝟐𝟓𝐭𝐡.
\r\nWe’ve lined up an incredible schedule just for you:
\r\n 𝟕:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: Kick off the night with Ahad’s captivating Belly Dance Class.
\r\n 𝟖:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: Get moving with Dudu’s high-energy Zumba Class.
\r\n 𝟗:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: End the evening on a spectacular note with a mesmerizing performance by the amazing dancer Anna.
\r\nIt’s the perfect way to celebrate the season, stay active, and enjoy the community.
\r\nDon’t miss out—let’s welcome 2025 together in style!
\r\n 212 Ladies Gym – Where Fitness Meets Fun!

Dear Family's and friends

\r\n\r\n

HAPPY NEW YEAR 2025

\r\n\r\n

We are pleased to announce the grand opening of our new guest house, the Pyramids Temple Guest House. We have put in a lot of effort and thought into creating a place that offers comfort, convenience, and a touch of Egyptian charm.

\r\n\r\n

We would be honored if you could join us for the opening party on 31 Dec 2024, from 9 pm to 1 Am.
\r\nWe promise an evening of good company, delicious Egyptian sweets, and refreshing beverages, including water and soft drinks. You are also welcome to bring along any drink with you.

\r\n\r\n

Feel free to extend this invitation to your family and friends. The more, the merrier!

\r\n\r\n

We look forward to welcoming you to our guest house and sharing a memorable evening of New Year 2025

\r\n\r\n

Best Regards
\r\nPyramids Temple Guest House

Meet people, make friends and speak a lot of language with BlaBla Cairo
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------
\r\n HOW OUR EVENTS WORK 
\r\n It's very easy.
\r\nWe always start our events in  English and / or the local language. Then, once two or three people want to speak the same language, it will be possible to create a new linguistic group. For example if 2 or 3 people wish to speak French, we will create a group in  French .
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 Yes, you can arrive late! Maximum 45min after the start of the event. However, being on time is greatly appreciated.
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 Our events are free; however, each participant shares in the space's rent.
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 /  By participating in our events, you agree to be photographed and / or filmed. The photos and videos will be shared on our social networks and may be used for commercial purposes. You can also post your own photos with the #BlaBlaSelfie and #BlaBlaLanguageExchange HTag
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 This event does not welcome children, even accompanied by parents

هذا الشهر، يسعدنا أن يكون "وصفي" هو المتحدث الضيف في Creative Mornings!
\r\nمن مدير حسابات إقليمي حائز على جوائز ذهبية إلى مؤسس ومدير عام وكالة Bubblegum Advertising، رحلة وصفي هي شهادة حقيقية على الشغف، والمخاطرة، والكثير من الإبداع. ✨
\r\nبخبرة تتجاوز 26 عامًا في كلاً من مصر والولايات المتحدة، يُعتبر وصفي قوة مؤثرة في عالم الإعلانات (وبالمناسبة، هو بطل قومي في الغطس أيضًا! 🏆).
\r\n
\r\nانضموا إلينا هذا الشهر لإكتشاف قصته، بينما نستكشف دورات الإبداع وما يلزم لصناعة حملات إعلانية ملهمة يتذكرها الناس لسنوات. 🗓️
\r\nفي انتظاركم السبت 28 ديسمبر، الساعة 11 صباحًا في قنصلية، 5 شارع الفضل، باب اللوق، عابدين.
\r\nالحضور مجانًا،

", "start_date": "2024-12-28", "end_date": "2024-12-28", "poster": [ { "id": 222, "name": "poster", "description": "website banner -myevnt _dec25_W4_V1_DT1 (1).jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2024_12_26/1IPY6mdt4yuzmyG9kUY5xEkH6rRA29kaUgJr6rSh.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 724542, "created_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z" } ], "banner": [ { "id": 223, "name": "banner", "description": "website banner -myevnt _dec25_W4_V1_DT1 (1).jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2024_12_26/QEJ8tkOdt06CZMafNIINyD79DlahO8teBOIYjRGR.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 724542, "created_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z" } ], "company": null, "category": { "id": 38, "parent_id": null, "name": "workshop", "is_parent": 1, "icon": "fa-solid fa-place-of-worship fa-2xl", "description": null, "created_at": "2024-12-22T22:15:13.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-05T17:47:46.000000Z" }, "city": { "id": 14, "country_id": 1, "is_available": true, "name": "Cairo", "created_at": "2024-10-10T01:39:04.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-10T01:39:04.000000Z" }, "currency": { "id": 5, "name": "Egyptain pound", "code": "EG", "status": true, "created_at": "2024-09-30T17:44:25.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-01T17:33:41.000000Z" }, "tickets": [ { "id": 78, "ticket_type": "Normal Price", "price": "0.00", "quantity": 50, "status": null, "created_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z" } ], "format": false, "address": null, "is_active": true, "cancellation_policy": null, "location": "قنصلية، 5 شارع الفضل، باب اللوق، عابدين.", "created_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-05T17:44:18.000000Z" }, { "id": 59, "name": "حفل ميكروفون 17 للمواهب الفنية", "description": "

ينظم بيت السناري التابع لقطاع التواصل الثقافي بمكتبة الإسكندرية حفلًا فنيًا مفتوحًا للجمهور بعنوان "ميكروفون 17"، يوم الخميس 9 يناير 2025 في تمام الــ 7 مساءً، بمقر بيت السناري الأثري في السيدة زينب، القاهرة.

\r\n\r\n

يشارك في الحفل مجموعة من المواهب الشابة التي ستقدم مجموعة مختارة من الأغاني والقصائد والأشعار التي ستلامس قلوب الحاضرين بجمال الكلمات وعذوبة الألحان، منهم:

\r\n\r\n

- مصطفى أسامة
\r\n- أحمد مدحت
\r\n- شريهان عرفة
\r\n- فوكس
\r\n- مايكل رضا

\r\n\r\n

يهدف هذا الحفل إلى نشر الوعي الثقافي وتشجيع المواهب الشابة، وتسليط الضوء على أهمية الفن والموسيقى في حياة الأفراد والمجتمع. كما يسعى إلى خلق حالة ثقافية إبداعية بين الشباب وتعزيز التواصل مع الشخصيات الثقافية والفنية والإعلامية المعروفة.

\r\n\r\n

يُذكر أن فريق "ميكروفون" تأسس منذ عام 2010، وهو تجمع فني وأدبي وثقافي للشباب الموهوبين، يعمل على اكتشاف المواهب وتقديم الفنون المختلفة.

دعوة لمحبين الأعمال اليدوية المميزة

\r\n\r\n

ندعوكم للمشاركة في أضخم حدث للفن اليدوي والحرف الأصيلة في مصر

\r\n\r\n

تعالوا واستمتعوا مجاناً بفعاليات معرض الحرف اليدوية في سوق الفسطاط ، حيث يجتمع الحرفيون والمبدعون من جميع محافظات مصر، ليعرضوا أجمل أعمالهم الفنية ومنتجاتهم الأصيلة.

\r\n\r\n

استعدوا لتجربة فريدة مليئة بالإبداع والجودة بين منتجات متنوعة من تطريز، إكسسوارات، منتجات جلدية، خزفية، لوحات، شموع، غيرها كتير

\r\n\r\n

 التاريخ: من 23 إلى 25 يناير
\r\n المكان: سوق الفسطاط، مصر القديمة، مجمع الأديان، أقرب محطة مترو (ماري جرجس)
\r\nلوكيشين السوق: https://maps.app.goo.gl/gjMHHXCr9M8EZLhg6

\r\n\r\n

انضموا إلينا واكتشفوا سحر الفنون والحرف، حيث الثقافة والترفيه يجتمعان في أجواء استثنائية!

\r\n\r\n

متفوتوش الفرصة للتواصل مع المبدعين مباشرة واقتناء مقتنيات فريدة.

\r\n\r\n

The Invitation is Open ( Free Entry )
\r\nWe will be waiting for you at the exhibition of arts and crafts from January 23 to 25, your opportunity to enjoy the most beautiful local products 
\r\nYou're invited to attend an exhibition dedicated to handmade art and authentic crafts, which is considered the largest gathering of craftsmen and creative people in Egypt. We will present various products that combine creativity and quality to you.
\r\nLocation: Fustat Market, Old Egypt https://maps.app.goo.gl/gjMHHXCr9M8EZLhg6 

\r\n\r\n

See less

Latin Love proudly invites you to it's biweekly SBK night at one of the most elegant spots. 

\r\n\r\n

Get ready for an unforgettable night of dance and music! Join us this Monday, December 23rd, for a FREE Bachata Partner-Work Workshop with the Latin Love Team Hussein, Hadia & Malak, from 9 to 10 PM. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced dancer, this workshop will bring out your best Bachata vibes! 

\r\n\r\n

 Date: Monday, 23rd of December 2024.
\r\n Location: Minglings Restobar [Heliopolis]
\r\n Address: 58 Beirut, Almazah, Heliopolis.

\r\n\r\n

Free Bachata Workshop from 9:00 to 10:00 PM

\r\n\r\n

 Celebrate 2025 with 212 Ladies Gym! 
\r\nJoin us for an unforgettable evening of fun, fitness, and celebration on 𝐖𝐞𝐝𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐝𝐚𝐲, 𝐃𝐞𝐜𝐞𝐦𝐛𝐞𝐫 𝟐𝟓𝐭𝐡.
\r\nWe’ve lined up an incredible schedule just for you:
\r\n 𝟕:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: Kick off the night with Ahad’s captivating Belly Dance Class.
\r\n 𝟖:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: Get moving with Dudu’s high-energy Zumba Class.
\r\n 𝟗:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: End the evening on a spectacular note with a mesmerizing performance by the amazing dancer Anna.
\r\nIt’s the perfect way to celebrate the season, stay active, and enjoy the community.
\r\nDon’t miss out—let’s welcome 2025 together in style!
\r\n 212 Ladies Gym – Where Fitness Meets Fun!

Dear Family's and friends

\r\n\r\n

HAPPY NEW YEAR 2025

\r\n\r\n

We are pleased to announce the grand opening of our new guest house, the Pyramids Temple Guest House. We have put in a lot of effort and thought into creating a place that offers comfort, convenience, and a touch of Egyptian charm.

\r\n\r\n

We would be honored if you could join us for the opening party on 31 Dec 2024, from 9 pm to 1 Am.
\r\nWe promise an evening of good company, delicious Egyptian sweets, and refreshing beverages, including water and soft drinks. You are also welcome to bring along any drink with you.

\r\n\r\n

Feel free to extend this invitation to your family and friends. The more, the merrier!

\r\n\r\n

We look forward to welcoming you to our guest house and sharing a memorable evening of New Year 2025

\r\n\r\n

Best Regards
\r\nPyramids Temple Guest House

", "start_date": "2024-12-31", "end_date": "2024-12-31", "poster": [ { "id": 216, "name": "poster", "description": "468532056_498105566584656_2964731599012086526_n.jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2024_12_24/nOwY0oEKv3vI8gA2LPDWqBgxeihF4Jmj2QG47oig.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 85289, "created_at": "2024-12-24T22:09:05.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-24T22:09:05.000000Z" } ], "banner": [ { "id": 217, "name": "banner", "description": "468532056_498105566584656_2964731599012086526_n.jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2024_12_24/sNBGkBetxYpEHeYKQKv9RUVaRM6qflRb9G6Sedc3.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 85289, "created_at": "2024-12-24T22:09:05.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-24T22:09:05.000000Z" } ], "company": null, "category": { "id": 39, "parent_id": null, "name": "Entertainment", "is_parent": 1, "icon": "fa-brands fa-centercode fa-2xl", "description": null, "created_at": "2024-12-23T16:33:26.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-05T17:50:03.000000Z" }, "city": { "id": 17, "country_id": 1, "is_available": true, "name": "Giza", "created_at": "2024-10-10T02:34:33.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-10T02:34:33.000000Z" }, "currency": { "id": 5, "name": "Egyptain pound", "code": "EG", "status": true, "created_at": "2024-09-30T17:44:25.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-01T17:33:41.000000Z" }, "tickets": [ { "id": 76, "ticket_type": "Normal Price", "price": "0.00", "quantity": 50, "status": null, "created_at": "2024-12-24T22:09:05.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-24T22:09:05.000000Z" } ], "format": false, "address": null, "is_active": true, "cancellation_policy": null, "location": "١٥ شارع سيدي جابر نزله السمان الهرم, \u200fالجيزة\u200f، \u200fمحافظة الجيزة\u200f، \u200fمصر\u200f1", "created_at": "2024-12-24T22:09:05.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-05T18:21:58.000000Z" }, { "id": 56, "name": "BlaBla Language Exchange-Cairo", "description": "

Meet people, make friends and speak a lot of language with BlaBla Cairo
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------
\r\n HOW OUR EVENTS WORK 
\r\n It's very easy.
\r\nWe always start our events in  English and / or the local language. Then, once two or three people want to speak the same language, it will be possible to create a new linguistic group. For example if 2 or 3 people wish to speak French, we will create a group in  French .
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 Yes, you can arrive late! Maximum 45min after the start of the event. However, being on time is greatly appreciated.
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 Our events are free; however, each participant shares in the space's rent.
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 /  By participating in our events, you agree to be photographed and / or filmed. The photos and videos will be shared on our social networks and may be used for commercial purposes. You can also post your own photos with the #BlaBlaSelfie and #BlaBlaLanguageExchange HTag
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 This event does not welcome children, even accompanied by parents

هذا الشهر، يسعدنا أن يكون "وصفي" هو المتحدث الضيف في Creative Mornings!
\r\nمن مدير حسابات إقليمي حائز على جوائز ذهبية إلى مؤسس ومدير عام وكالة Bubblegum Advertising، رحلة وصفي هي شهادة حقيقية على الشغف، والمخاطرة، والكثير من الإبداع. ✨
\r\nبخبرة تتجاوز 26 عامًا في كلاً من مصر والولايات المتحدة، يُعتبر وصفي قوة مؤثرة في عالم الإعلانات (وبالمناسبة، هو بطل قومي في الغطس أيضًا! 🏆).
\r\n
\r\nانضموا إلينا هذا الشهر لإكتشاف قصته، بينما نستكشف دورات الإبداع وما يلزم لصناعة حملات إعلانية ملهمة يتذكرها الناس لسنوات. 🗓️
\r\nفي انتظاركم السبت 28 ديسمبر، الساعة 11 صباحًا في قنصلية، 5 شارع الفضل، باب اللوق، عابدين.
\r\nالحضور مجانًا،

ينظم بيت السناري التابع لقطاع التواصل الثقافي بمكتبة الإسكندرية حفلًا فنيًا مفتوحًا للجمهور بعنوان "ميكروفون 17"، يوم الخميس 9 يناير 2025 في تمام الــ 7 مساءً، بمقر بيت السناري الأثري في السيدة زينب، القاهرة.

\r\n\r\n

يشارك في الحفل مجموعة من المواهب الشابة التي ستقدم مجموعة مختارة من الأغاني والقصائد والأشعار التي ستلامس قلوب الحاضرين بجمال الكلمات وعذوبة الألحان، منهم:

\r\n\r\n

- مصطفى أسامة
\r\n- أحمد مدحت
\r\n- شريهان عرفة
\r\n- فوكس
\r\n- مايكل رضا

\r\n\r\n

يهدف هذا الحفل إلى نشر الوعي الثقافي وتشجيع المواهب الشابة، وتسليط الضوء على أهمية الفن والموسيقى في حياة الأفراد والمجتمع. كما يسعى إلى خلق حالة ثقافية إبداعية بين الشباب وتعزيز التواصل مع الشخصيات الثقافية والفنية والإعلامية المعروفة.

\r\n\r\n

يُذكر أن فريق "ميكروفون" تأسس منذ عام 2010، وهو تجمع فني وأدبي وثقافي للشباب الموهوبين، يعمل على اكتشاف المواهب وتقديم الفنون المختلفة.

", "start_date": "2025-01-09", "end_date": "2025-01-09", "poster": [ { "id": 228, "name": "poster", "description": "472270895_985621623596190_509258642796573342_n.jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2025_01_07/1FUCWpXPrvYkmew6sh4aByB9O21jQdulp7eLF0cY.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 463530, "created_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z" } ], "banner": [ { "id": 229, "name": "banner", "description": "472270895_985621623596190_509258642796573342_n.jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2025_01_07/5FTynAch45fDB0vNv0XaipXLtjC1dMIj2PCLTxvX.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 463530, "created_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z" } ], "company": null, "category": { "id": 18, "parent_id": null, "name": "Culture", "is_parent": 1, "icon": "fas fa-landmark fa-2x", "description": null, "created_at": "2024-09-30T21:34:50.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-09-30T21:34:50.000000Z" }, "city": { "id": 14, "country_id": 1, "is_available": true, "name": "Cairo", "created_at": "2024-10-10T01:39:04.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-10T01:39:04.000000Z" }, "currency": { "id": 5, "name": "Egyptain pound", "code": "EG", "status": true, "created_at": "2024-09-30T17:44:25.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-01T17:33:41.000000Z" }, "tickets": [ { "id": 80, "ticket_type": "Normal Price", "price": "0.00", "quantity": 50, "status": null, "created_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z" } ], "format": false, "address": null, "is_active": true, "cancellation_policy": null, "location": "\u200e\u200eبيت السناري، شارع الكومي،, حارة الكاشف، قسم السيدة زينب\u200e\u200e, Cairo, Egypt, 11622", "created_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-07T13:39:36.000000Z" }, { "id": 60, "name": "معرض الحرف اليدوية بسوق الفسطاط", "description": "

دعوة لمحبين الأعمال اليدوية المميزة

\r\n\r\n

ندعوكم للمشاركة في أضخم حدث للفن اليدوي والحرف الأصيلة في مصر

\r\n\r\n

تعالوا واستمتعوا مجاناً بفعاليات معرض الحرف اليدوية في سوق الفسطاط ، حيث يجتمع الحرفيون والمبدعون من جميع محافظات مصر، ليعرضوا أجمل أعمالهم الفنية ومنتجاتهم الأصيلة.

\r\n\r\n

استعدوا لتجربة فريدة مليئة بالإبداع والجودة بين منتجات متنوعة من تطريز، إكسسوارات، منتجات جلدية، خزفية، لوحات، شموع، غيرها كتير

\r\n\r\n

 التاريخ: من 23 إلى 25 يناير
\r\n المكان: سوق الفسطاط، مصر القديمة، مجمع الأديان، أقرب محطة مترو (ماري جرجس)
\r\nلوكيشين السوق: https://maps.app.goo.gl/gjMHHXCr9M8EZLhg6

\r\n\r\n

انضموا إلينا واكتشفوا سحر الفنون والحرف، حيث الثقافة والترفيه يجتمعان في أجواء استثنائية!

\r\n\r\n

متفوتوش الفرصة للتواصل مع المبدعين مباشرة واقتناء مقتنيات فريدة.

\r\n\r\n

The Invitation is Open ( Free Entry )
\r\nWe will be waiting for you at the exhibition of arts and crafts from January 23 to 25, your opportunity to enjoy the most beautiful local products 
\r\nYou're invited to attend an exhibition dedicated to handmade art and authentic crafts, which is considered the largest gathering of craftsmen and creative people in Egypt. We will present various products that combine creativity and quality to you.
\r\nLocation: Fustat Market, Old Egypt https://maps.app.goo.gl/gjMHHXCr9M8EZLhg6 

\r\n\r\n

Whether you're a beginner or an experienced dancer, this workshop will bring out your best Bachata vibes!

\r\n Location: Minglings Restobar [Heliopolis]
\r\n Address: 58 Beirut, Almazah, Heliopolis.

Free Bachata Workshop from 9:00 to 10:00 PM

\r\n\r\n

 Celebrate 2025 with 212 Ladies Gym! 
\r\nJoin us for an unforgettable evening of fun, fitness, and celebration on 𝐖𝐞𝐝𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐝𝐚𝐲, 𝐃𝐞𝐜𝐞𝐦𝐛𝐞𝐫 𝟐𝟓𝐭𝐡.
\r\nWe’ve lined up an incredible schedule just for you:
\r\n 𝟕:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: Kick off the night with Ahad’s captivating Belly Dance Class.
\r\n 𝟖:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: Get moving with Dudu’s high-energy Zumba Class.
\r\n 𝟗:𝟎𝟎 𝐏𝐌: End the evening on a spectacular note with a mesmerizing performance by the amazing dancer Anna.
\r\nIt’s the perfect way to celebrate the season, stay active, and enjoy the community.
\r\nDon’t miss out—let’s welcome 2025 together in style!
\r\n 212 Ladies Gym – Where Fitness Meets Fun!

Dear Family's and friends

\r\n\r\n

HAPPY NEW YEAR 2025

\r\n\r\n

We are pleased to announce the grand opening of our new guest house, the Pyramids Temple Guest House. We have put in a lot of effort and thought into creating a place that offers comfort, convenience, and a touch of Egyptian charm.

\r\n\r\n

We would be honored if you could join us for the opening party on 31 Dec 2024, from 9 pm to 1 Am.
\r\nWe promise an evening of good company, delicious Egyptian sweets, and refreshing beverages, including water and soft drinks. You are also welcome to bring along any drink with you.

\r\n\r\n

Feel free to extend this invitation to your family and friends. The more, the merrier!

\r\n\r\n

We look forward to welcoming you to our guest house and sharing a memorable evening of New Year 2025

\r\n\r\n

Best Regards
\r\nPyramids Temple Guest House

Meet people, make friends and speak a lot of language with BlaBla Cairo
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------
\r\n HOW OUR EVENTS WORK 
\r\n It's very easy.
\r\nWe always start our events in  English and / or the local language. Then, once two or three people want to speak the same language, it will be possible to create a new linguistic group. For example if 2 or 3 people wish to speak French, we will create a group in  French .
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 Yes, you can arrive late! Maximum 45min after the start of the event. However, being on time is greatly appreciated.
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 Our events are free; however, each participant shares in the space's rent.
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 /  By participating in our events, you agree to be photographed and / or filmed. The photos and videos will be shared on our social networks and may be used for commercial purposes. You can also post your own photos with the #BlaBlaSelfie and #BlaBlaLanguageExchange HTag
\r\n--------------------------------------------------------------------------

\r\n\r\n

 This event does not welcome children, even accompanied by parents

هذا الشهر، يسعدنا أن يكون "وصفي" هو المتحدث الضيف في Creative Mornings!
\r\nمن مدير حسابات إقليمي حائز على جوائز ذهبية إلى مؤسس ومدير عام وكالة Bubblegum Advertising، رحلة وصفي هي شهادة حقيقية على الشغف، والمخاطرة، والكثير من الإبداع. ✨
\r\nبخبرة تتجاوز 26 عامًا في كلاً من مصر والولايات المتحدة، يُعتبر وصفي قوة مؤثرة في عالم الإعلانات (وبالمناسبة، هو بطل قومي في الغطس أيضًا! 🏆).
\r\n
\r\nانضموا إلينا هذا الشهر لإكتشاف قصته، بينما نستكشف دورات الإبداع وما يلزم لصناعة حملات إعلانية ملهمة يتذكرها الناس لسنوات. 🗓️
\r\nفي انتظاركم السبت 28 ديسمبر، الساعة 11 صباحًا في قنصلية، 5 شارع الفضل، باب اللوق، عابدين.
\r\nالحضور مجانًا،

", "start_date": "2024-12-28", "end_date": "2024-12-28", "poster": [ { "id": 222, "name": "poster", "description": "website banner -myevnt _dec25_W4_V1_DT1 (1).jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2024_12_26/1IPY6mdt4yuzmyG9kUY5xEkH6rRA29kaUgJr6rSh.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 724542, "created_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z" } ], "banner": [ { "id": 223, "name": "banner", "description": "website banner -myevnt _dec25_W4_V1_DT1 (1).jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2024_12_26/QEJ8tkOdt06CZMafNIINyD79DlahO8teBOIYjRGR.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 724542, "created_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z" } ], "company": null, "category": { "id": 38, "parent_id": null, "name": "workshop", "is_parent": 1, "icon": "fa-solid fa-place-of-worship fa-2xl", "description": null, "created_at": "2024-12-22T22:15:13.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-05T17:47:46.000000Z" }, "city": { "id": 14, "country_id": 1, "is_available": true, "name": "Cairo", "created_at": "2024-10-10T01:39:04.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-10T01:39:04.000000Z" }, "currency": { "id": 5, "name": "Egyptain pound", "code": "EG", "status": true, "created_at": "2024-09-30T17:44:25.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-01T17:33:41.000000Z" }, "tickets": [ { "id": 78, "ticket_type": "Normal Price", "price": "0.00", "quantity": 50, "status": null, "created_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z" } ], "format": false, "address": null, "is_active": true, "cancellation_policy": null, "location": "قنصلية، 5 شارع الفضل، باب اللوق، عابدين.", "created_at": "2024-12-26T22:45:01.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-05T17:44:18.000000Z" }, { "id": 59, "name": "حفل ميكروفون 17 للمواهب الفنية", "description": "

ينظم بيت السناري التابع لقطاع التواصل الثقافي بمكتبة الإسكندرية حفلًا فنيًا مفتوحًا للجمهور بعنوان "ميكروفون 17"، يوم الخميس 9 يناير 2025 في تمام الــ 7 مساءً، بمقر بيت السناري الأثري في السيدة زينب، القاهرة.

\r\n\r\n

يشارك في الحفل مجموعة من المواهب الشابة التي ستقدم مجموعة مختارة من الأغاني والقصائد والأشعار التي ستلامس قلوب الحاضرين بجمال الكلمات وعذوبة الألحان، منهم:

\r\n\r\n

- مصطفى أسامة
\r\n- أحمد مدحت
\r\n- شريهان عرفة
\r\n- فوكس
\r\n- مايكل رضا

\r\n\r\n

يهدف هذا الحفل إلى نشر الوعي الثقافي وتشجيع المواهب الشابة، وتسليط الضوء على أهمية الفن والموسيقى في حياة الأفراد والمجتمع. كما يسعى إلى خلق حالة ثقافية إبداعية بين الشباب وتعزيز التواصل مع الشخصيات الثقافية والفنية والإعلامية المعروفة.

\r\n\r\n

يُذكر أن فريق "ميكروفون" تأسس منذ عام 2010، وهو تجمع فني وأدبي وثقافي للشباب الموهوبين، يعمل على اكتشاف المواهب وتقديم الفنون المختلفة.

", "start_date": "2025-01-09", "end_date": "2025-01-09", "poster": [ { "id": 228, "name": "poster", "description": "472270895_985621623596190_509258642796573342_n.jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2025_01_07/1FUCWpXPrvYkmew6sh4aByB9O21jQdulp7eLF0cY.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 463530, "created_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z" } ], "banner": [ { "id": 229, "name": "banner", "description": "472270895_985621623596190_509258642796573342_n.jpg", "path": "/storage/event/2025_01_07/5FTynAch45fDB0vNv0XaipXLtjC1dMIj2PCLTxvX.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "is_main": false, "size": 463530, "created_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z" } ], "company": null, "category": { "id": 18, "parent_id": null, "name": "Culture", "is_parent": 1, "icon": "fas fa-landmark fa-2x", "description": null, "created_at": "2024-09-30T21:34:50.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-09-30T21:34:50.000000Z" }, "city": { "id": 14, "country_id": 1, "is_available": true, "name": "Cairo", "created_at": "2024-10-10T01:39:04.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-10T01:39:04.000000Z" }, "currency": { "id": 5, "name": "Egyptain pound", "code": "EG", "status": true, "created_at": "2024-09-30T17:44:25.000000Z", "updated_at": "2024-10-01T17:33:41.000000Z" }, "tickets": [ { "id": 80, "ticket_type": "Normal Price", "price": "0.00", "quantity": 50, "status": null, "created_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z" } ], "format": false, "address": null, "is_active": true, "cancellation_policy": null, "location": "\u200e\u200eبيت السناري، شارع الكومي،, حارة الكاشف، قسم السيدة زينب\u200e\u200e, Cairo, Egypt, 11622", "created_at": "2025-01-07T19:01:57.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-01-07T13:39:36.000000Z" }, { "id": 60, "name": "معرض الحرف اليدوية بسوق الفسطاط", "description": "

دعوة لمحبين الأعمال اليدوية المميزة

\r\n\r\n

ندعوكم للمشاركة في أضخم حدث للفن اليدوي والحرف الأصيلة في مصر

\r\n\r\n

تعالوا واستمتعوا مجاناً بفعاليات معرض الحرف اليدوية في سوق الفسطاط ، حيث يجتمع الحرفيون والمبدعون من جميع محافظات مصر، ليعرضوا أجمل أعمالهم الفنية ومنتجاتهم الأصيلة.

\r\n\r\n

استعدوا لتجربة فريدة مليئة بالإبداع والجودة بين منتجات متنوعة من تطريز، إكسسوارات، منتجات جلدية، خزفية، لوحات، شموع، غيرها كتير

\r\n\r\n

 التاريخ: من 23 إلى 25 يناير
\r\n المكان: سوق الفسطاط، مصر القديمة، مجمع الأديان، أقرب محطة مترو (ماري جرجس)
\r\nلوكيشين السوق: https://maps.app.goo.gl/gjMHHXCr9M8EZLhg6

\r\n\r\n

انضموا إلينا واكتشفوا سحر الفنون والحرف، حيث الثقافة والترفيه يجتمعان في أجواء استثنائية!

\r\n\r\n

متفوتوش الفرصة للتواصل مع المبدعين مباشرة واقتناء مقتنيات فريدة.

\r\n\r\n

The Invitation is Open ( Free Entry )
\r\nWe will be waiting for you at the exhibition of arts and crafts from January 23 to 25, your opportunity to enjoy the most beautiful local products 
\r\nYou're invited to attend an exhibition dedicated to handmade art and authentic crafts, which is considered the largest gathering of craftsmen and creative people in Egypt. We will present various products that combine creativity and quality to you.
\r\nLocation: Fustat Market, Old Egypt https://maps.app.goo.gl/gjMHHXCr9M8EZLhg6 

\r\n\r\n

See less

{ "data": [ { "id": 78, "name": "Egyptballroomers Valentine's Party", "description": "

 

\r\n\r\n

Egyptballroomers Valentine's Party

\r\n\r\n

Egyptballroomers
\r\nValentine's Party ❤️😍
\r\n
\r\nJoin us in our big Valentine’s celebration An evening of Romance & Dance
\r\n🎉🌹💃🏻🤩
\r\n
\r\nIn one of the most elegant venues in Town @Greek Club Cairo - Down Town 💯🤩
\r\n
\r\nEvent program:
\r\nMusic starts 8:00 pm with the best romantic love tracks ❤️❤️
\r\n
\r\n8:30 - 9:30pm
\r\nLive Music Performance with one of the most Egyptian talented Violinist🎻
\r\n“Amr Darwish”
\r\n
\r\nParty Time : 9:30 pm - Midnight
\r\n
\r\nDress code: Valentine’s Colors ❤️🖤🤍

Folklorita: Reviving Egyptian Heritage @ MASQ

\r\n\r\n

 Date: Saturday, 18 January 2024
\r\n Time: 4:00 PM – 5:00 PM
\r\n Location: Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey

\r\n\r\n

Join us for an enchanting evening of traditional Egyptian music as Folklorita takes the stage at the historic Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey. This concert is part of the "Heritage for the People" series, celebrating the fusion of heritage and community development.

\r\n\r\n

Folklorita, an Egyptian musical ensemble founded in 2024, breathes new life into traditional folklore with a contemporary twist. Their performances have garnered acclaim for revitalising Egypt's rich musical heritage.

\r\n\r\n

The Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey, a historic Sufi complex from 1519-1524, was restored by ARCHiNOS in 2018-2019 with EU funding. Now is part of MASQ (Multicultural and Artistic Space at Qaitbey's) and operated by the Sultan Foundation, it serves as a cultural hub hosting Egyptian and international arts events alongside community programs.

\r\n\r\n

Don't miss this unique opportunity to experience the harmonious blend of Egypt's musical traditions within a historic setting. Mark your calendars and join us for an unforgettable cultural experience.

", "start_date": "2025-02-14", "end_date": "2025-02-14", "poster": { "id": 282, "mediable_type": "App\\Models\\Event", "mediable_id": 80, "name": "poster", "description": "1.jpeg", "path": "event/2025_02_12/Sslx6zswRDTsglPLc95t120LUcrappqeJkn2x8q0.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "size": 146936, "is_main": false, "created_at": "2025-02-12T16:57:45.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-02-12T16:57:45.000000Z" }, "banner": { "id": 283, "mediable_type": "App\\Models\\Event", "mediable_id": 80, "name": "banner", "description": "1.jpeg", "path": "event/2025_02_12/sKaiVfwZ0GPTu95dRvYEaxQ4N4RRtrIPJeaqRIvD.jpg", "type": "image/jpeg", "order": 0, "size": 146936, "is_main": false, "created_at": "2025-02-12T16:57:45.000000Z", "updated_at": "2025-02-12T16:57:45.000000Z" }, "company": null, "category": { "id": 14, "name": "Music", "description": null, "icon": "fas fa-music fa-2x", "is_parent": 1, "parent_id": null, "child": [], "events": [ { "id": 66, "category_id": 14, "sub_category_id": null, "city_id": 14, "currency_id": 5, "company_id": null, "ad_fee_id": null, "name": "Folklorita: Reviving Egyptian Heritage @ MASQ", "upload_by": "myevnt", "organized_by": "MASQ - Multicultural and Artistic Space at Qaitbey's", "location": "Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey", "description": "

Folklorita: Reviving Egyptian Heritage @ MASQ

\r\n\r\n

 Date: Saturday, 18 January 2024
\r\n Time: 4:00 PM – 5:00 PM
\r\n Location: Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey

\r\n\r\n

Join us for an enchanting evening of traditional Egyptian music as Folklorita takes the stage at the historic Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey. This concert is part of the "Heritage for the People" series, celebrating the fusion of heritage and community development.

\r\n\r\n

Folklorita, an Egyptian musical ensemble founded in 2024, breathes new life into traditional folklore with a contemporary twist. Their performances have garnered acclaim for revitalising Egypt's rich musical heritage.

\r\n\r\n

The Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey, a historic Sufi complex from 1519-1524, was restored by ARCHiNOS in 2018-2019 with EU funding. Now is part of MASQ (Multicultural and Artistic Space at Qaitbey's) and operated by the Sultan Foundation, it serves as a cultural hub hosting Egyptian and international arts events alongside community programs.

\r\n\r\n

Don't miss this unique opportunity to experience the harmonious blend of Egypt's musical traditions within a historic setting. Mark your calendars and join us for an unforgettable cultural experience.

Folklorita: Reviving Egyptian Heritage @ MASQ

\r\n\r\n

 Date: Saturday, 18 January 2024
\r\n Time: 4:00 PM – 5:00 PM
\r\n Location: Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey

\r\n\r\n

Join us for an enchanting evening of traditional Egyptian music as Folklorita takes the stage at the historic Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey. This concert is part of the "Heritage for the People" series, celebrating the fusion of heritage and community development.

\r\n\r\n

Folklorita, an Egyptian musical ensemble founded in 2024, breathes new life into traditional folklore with a contemporary twist. Their performances have garnered acclaim for revitalising Egypt's rich musical heritage.

\r\n\r\n

The Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey, a historic Sufi complex from 1519-1524, was restored by ARCHiNOS in 2018-2019 with EU funding. Now is part of MASQ (Multicultural and Artistic Space at Qaitbey's) and operated by the Sultan Foundation, it serves as a cultural hub hosting Egyptian and international arts events alongside community programs.

\r\n\r\n

Don't miss this unique opportunity to experience the harmonious blend of Egypt's musical traditions within a historic setting. Mark your calendars and join us for an unforgettable cultural experience.

دعوة لمحبين الأعمال اليدوية المميزة

\r\n\r\n

ندعوكم للمشاركة في أضخم حدث للفن اليدوي والحرف الأصيلة في مصر

\r\n\r\n

تعالوا واستمتعوا مجاناً بفعاليات معرض الحرف اليدوية في سوق الفسطاط ، حيث يجتمع الحرفيون والمبدعون من جميع محافظات مصر، ليعرضوا أجمل أعمالهم الفنية ومنتجاتهم الأصيلة.

\r\n\r\n

استعدوا لتجربة فريدة مليئة بالإبداع والجودة بين منتجات متنوعة من تطريز، إكسسوارات، منتجات جلدية، خزفية، لوحات، شموع، غيرها كتير

\r\n\r\n

 التاريخ: من 23 إلى 25 يناير
\r\n المكان: سوق الفسطاط، مصر القديمة، مجمع الأديان، أقرب محطة مترو (ماري جرجس)
\r\nلوكيشين السوق: https://maps.app.goo.gl/gjMHHXCr9M8EZLhg6

\r\n\r\n

انضموا إلينا واكتشفوا سحر الفنون والحرف، حيث الثقافة والترفيه يجتمعان في أجواء استثنائية!

\r\n\r\n

متفوتوش الفرصة للتواصل مع المبدعين مباشرة واقتناء مقتنيات فريدة.

\r\n\r\n

The Invitation is Open ( Free Entry )
\r\nWe will be waiting for you at the exhibition of arts and crafts from January 23 to 25, your opportunity to enjoy the most beautiful local products 
\r\nYou're invited to attend an exhibition dedicated to handmade art and authentic crafts, which is considered the largest gathering of craftsmen and creative people in Egypt. We will present various products that combine creativity and quality to you.
\r\nLocation: Fustat Market, Old Egypt https://maps.app.goo.gl/gjMHHXCr9M8EZLhg6 

\r\n\r\n

دعوة لمحبين الأعمال اليدوية المميزة

\r\n\r\n

ندعوكم للمشاركة في أضخم حدث للفن اليدوي والحرف الأصيلة في مصر

\r\n\r\n

تعالوا واستمتعوا مجاناً بفعاليات معرض الحرف اليدوية في سوق الفسطاط ، حيث يجتمع الحرفيون والمبدعون من جميع محافظات مصر، ليعرضوا أجمل أعمالهم الفنية ومنتجاتهم الأصيلة.

\r\n\r\n

استعدوا لتجربة فريدة مليئة بالإبداع والجودة بين منتجات متنوعة من تطريز، إكسسوارات، منتجات جلدية، خزفية، لوحات، شموع، غيرها كتير

\r\n\r\n

\r\n\r\n

متفوتوش الفرصة للتواصل مع المبدعين مباشرة واقتناء مقتنيات فريدة.

\r\n\r\n

The Invitation is Open ( Free Entry )
\r\nWe will be waiting for you at the exhibition of arts and crafts from January 23 to 25, your opportunity to enjoy the most beautiful local products

Folklorita: Reviving Egyptian Heritage @ MASQ

\r\n\r\n

 Date: Saturday, 18 January 2024
\r\n Time: 4:00 PM – 5:00 PM
\r\n Location: Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey

\r\n\r\n

Join us for an enchanting evening of traditional Egyptian music as Folklorita takes the stage at the historic Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey. This concert is part of the "Heritage for the People" series, celebrating the fusion of heritage and community development.

\r\n\r\n

Folklorita, an Egyptian musical ensemble founded in 2024, breathes new life into traditional folklore with a contemporary twist. Their performances have garnered acclaim for revitalising Egypt's rich musical heritage.

\r\n\r\n

The Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey, a historic Sufi complex from 1519-1524, was restored by ARCHiNOS in 2018-2019 with EU funding. Now is part of MASQ (Multicultural and Artistic Space at Qaitbey's) and operated by the Sultan Foundation, it serves as a cultural hub hosting Egyptian and international arts events alongside community programs.

\r\n\r\n

Don't miss this unique opportunity to experience the harmonious blend of Egypt's musical traditions within a historic setting. Mark your calendars and join us for an unforgettable cultural experience.

Folklorita: Reviving Egyptian Heritage @ MASQ

\r\n\r\n

 Date: Saturday, 18 January 2024
\r\n Time: 4:00 PM – 5:00 PM
\r\n Location: Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey

\r\n\r\n

Join us for an enchanting evening of traditional Egyptian music as Folklorita takes the stage at the historic Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey. This concert is part of the "Heritage for the People" series, celebrating the fusion of heritage and community development.

\r\n\r\n

Folklorita, an Egyptian musical ensemble founded in 2024, breathes new life into traditional folklore with a contemporary twist. Their performances have garnered acclaim for revitalising Egypt's rich musical heritage.

\r\n\r\n

The Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey, a historic Sufi complex from 1519-1524, was restored by ARCHiNOS in 2018-2019 with EU funding. Now is part of MASQ (Multicultural and Artistic Space at Qaitbey's) and operated by the Sultan Foundation, it serves as a cultural hub hosting Egyptian and international arts events alongside community programs.

\r\n\r\n

Don't miss this unique opportunity to experience the harmonious blend of Egypt's musical traditions within a historic setting. Mark your calendars and join us for an unforgettable cultural experience.

Folklorita: Reviving Egyptian Heritage @ MASQ

\r\n\r\n

 Date: Saturday, 18 January 2024
\r\n Time: 4:00 PM – 5:00 PM
\r\n Location: Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey

\r\n\r\n

Join us for an enchanting evening of traditional Egyptian music as Folklorita takes the stage at the historic Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey. This concert is part of the "Heritage for the People" series, celebrating the fusion of heritage and community development.

\r\n\r\n

Folklorita, an Egyptian musical ensemble founded in 2024, breathes new life into traditional folklore with a contemporary twist. Their performances have garnered acclaim for revitalising Egypt's rich musical heritage.

\r\n\r\n

The Maq'ad of Sultan Qaitbey, a historic Sufi complex from 1519-1524, was restored by ARCHiNOS in 2018-2019 with EU funding. Now is part of MASQ (Multicultural and Artistic Space at Qaitbey's) and operated by the Sultan Foundation, it serves as a cultural hub hosting Egyptian and international arts events alongside community programs.

\r\n\r\n

Don't miss this unique opportunity to experience the harmonious blend of Egypt's musical traditions within a historic setting. Mark your calendars and join us for an unforgettable cultural experience.

"Love is in the air, and so is the music! Blue Iris is back and stronger than ever for this year's cupid day, ready to serenade you and your loved ones on an unforgettable evening of music, love, and nostalgia.
\r\n
\r\nWhether you're celebrating with someone special or just your love for great music, this is the perfect way to make your Valentine's Day extra special.
\r\n
\r\nMeet the band!
\r\nVocalists:
\r\nAnan Gouda
\r\nSandy Essam
\r\nFarida Saeed
\r\nGuitarist: Omnya Ali
\r\nPianist: Tony Ibrahim
\r\nBassist/saxophonist: Bishoy Fekry
\r\nDrummer: Salma El Shereef"
\r\n
\r\nDoors open at 7:30, concert starts at 08:00
\r\n-Shared tables
\r\n-Ticket price: 200 LE + 1 minimum order per person(not included in the ticket price)
\r\n-Tickets are non-refundable
\r\n-You can purchase your ticket from the branch itself, or through the following online link:
\r\n
\r\nhttps://www.easykash.net/SWW7652

{ "data": { "id": 51, "name": "latin night x minglings", "description": "

Latin Love proudly invites you to it's biweekly SBK night at one of the most elegant spots. 

\r\n\r\n

Get ready for an unforgettable night of dance and music! Join us this Monday, December 23rd, for a FREE Bachata Partner-Work Workshop with the Latin Love Team Hussein, Hadia & Malak, from 9 to 10 PM. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced dancer, this workshop will bring out your best Bachata vibes! 

\r\n\r\n

 Date: Monday, 23rd of December 2024.
\r\n Location: Minglings Restobar [Heliopolis]
\r\n Address: 58 Beirut, Almazah, Heliopolis.

\r\n\r\n

Free Bachata Workshop from 9:00 to 10:00 PM
